content: I'm glad you found those tips helpful! Remember, breaking out of your shell and meeting new people takes time and effort, but it's worth it in the long run. You're taking the first step by attending a meetup, and that's something to be proud of. Don't be too hard on yourself if it doesn't click with everyone you meet, but instead, focus on building connections and having fun. Good luck, and I hope you have a great time at your meetup!
